attributes.additional_details: To regulate PCN charging companies from profiteering, from ordinary families to shop in towns without worrying and how long people have to wait in hospital due to waiting times.
attributes.background: To Stop people from excessive charges to park in hospitals, doctors and small towns and to use bar codes if they have an appointment.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action:

Fund free hospital parking in England for all patients
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727190
